verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H5921"\w* end, \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. How long, O Lord, wilt thou forget \w me|strong="H5921"\w* unto \w the|strong="H5921"\w* end? how long dost thou turn away thy face \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*?

\w How|strong="H3588"\w* long \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* take counsels \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul, sorrow \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* heart all \w the|strong="H3588"\w* day?
How long \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* enemy \w be|strong="H0376"\w* exalted over \w me|strong="H1696"\w*?

Consider, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hear \w me|strong="H1696"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*. Enlighten \w my|strong="H3605"\w* eyes \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* never sleep \w in|strong="H3068"\w* death:

Lest \w at|strong="H0113"\w* any time \w my|strong="H0834"\w* enemy \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w prevailed|strong="H1396"\w* \w against|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H0854"\w*. \w They|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* trouble \w me|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* rejoice \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* am moved:

\w But|strong="H6258"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* trusted \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*. \w My|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*: \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sing \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* giveth \w me|strong="H3468"\w* \w good|strong="H6965"\w* things: yea \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sing \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w name|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* most high.
